rules.description: Neo2 mod 3 and 4 keys (Apple keyboard). Toggle mod4 by pressing both mod4 keys simultaneously.
Neo2 mod 3 and 4 keys (Windows keyboard). Toggle mod4 by pressing both mod4 keys simultaneously.
Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift + right_shift at the same time
Tab acts as Ctrl if pressed with another key
Prevent problematic keys (?, /, #, =, and ')') from being treated as option key shortcut
Prevent all layer 3 keys from being treated as option key shortcut
